description: Go for green with this cucumber, lemon and kale smoothie. Perfect for breakfast or as a healthy afternoon pick-me-up.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Summer,Stone fruit,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Kale,Vegan,Jan Feb 2021,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Cucumber, Lemon & Kale Smoothies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place cucumber, kale, lemon, avocado, coconut water and mint in a blender with 4 ice cubes and blitz until smooth. Serve topped with extra mint leaves.
